title: World Development Indicators - Series-Year Metadata
description: Time-specific metadata for World Development Indicator series, documenting methodological changes, data revisions, or important events affecting the indicator in specific years.

columns.indicator_code: Unique World Bank identifier code for the indicator
columns.year: Year that the metadata applies to
columns.description: Notes about methodological changes, data revisions, or important context for the indicator in this specific year
